description: ICS techniques mitigated by Account Use Policies, ATT&CK mitigation M0936 (v1.0)
name: Account Use Policies (M0936)

techniques.comment: Configure features related to account use like login attempt lockouts, specific login times, and password strength requirements as examples. Consider these features as they relate to assets which may impact safety and availability. (Citation: Keith Stouffer May 2015)
